name: json-ref-lite
description: Extremely light weight way to resolve jsonschema '$ref' references & inheritance: create circular/graphs, fractals from json (browser/coffeescript/javascript).

scripts.test: coffee test/test.coffee > test/test.now ; diff --brief test/test.now test/test.out && echo 'test OK' || exit 1
scripts.browser: /bin/bash -c 'coffee -c *.coffee test/*.coffee && npx browserify -r .:json-ref-lite | npx uglifyjs -o json-ref-lite.min.js'

keywords: json jsonschema ref json pointers jsonref remote reference lightweight
